00010 #include <complex>
00011 #include <fftw3.h>
00012 #include "ndarray/fft/FourierTraits.hpp"

00014 namespace ndarray {
00016 namespace detail {
00017 
00022 template <typename T> struct FFTWTraits { BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(T) < 0); };
00023 
00025 
00026     template <> struct FFTWTraits<float> {
00027         BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((!boost::is_const<float>::value));
00028         typedef fftwf_plan Plan;
00029         typedef FourierTraits<float>::ElementX ElementX;
00030         typedef FourierTraits<float>::ElementK ElementK;
00031         typedef boost::shared_ptr<ElementX> OwnerX;
00032         typedef boost::shared_ptr<ElementK> OwnerK;
00033         static inline Plan forward(int rank, const int *n, int howmany, 
00034                                    ElementX *in, const int *inembed, int istride, int idist,
00035                                    ElementK *out, const int *onembed, int ostride, int odist,
00036                                    unsigned flags) {                    
00037             return fftwf_plan_many_dft_r2c(rank, n, howmany,
00038                                         in, inembed, istride, idist,
00039                                         reinterpret_cast<fftwf_complex*>(out),
00040                                         onembed, ostride, odist,
00041                                         flags);                 
00042         }
00043         static inline Plan inverse(int rank, const int *n, int howmany,
00044                                    ElementK *in, const int *inembed, int istride, int idist,
00045                                    ElementX *out, const int *onembed, int ostride, int odist,
00046                                    unsigned flags) {                    
00047             return fftwf_plan_many_dft_c2r(rank, n, howmany,
00048                                         reinterpret_cast<fftwf_complex*>(in),
00049                                         inembed, istride, idist,
00050                                         out, onembed, ostride, odist,
00051                                         flags);                 
00052         }
00053         static inline void destroy(Plan p) { fftwf_destroy_plan(p); }
00054         static inline void execute(Plan p) { fftwf_execute(p); }        
00055         static inline OwnerX allocateX(int n) {
00056             return OwnerX(
00057                 reinterpret_cast<ElementX*>(
00058                     fftwf_malloc(sizeof(ElementX)*n)
00059                 ),
00060                 fftwf_free
00061             );
00062         }
00063         static inline OwnerK allocateK(int n) {
00064             return OwnerK(
00065                 reinterpret_cast<ElementK*>(
00066                     fftwf_malloc(sizeof(ElementK)*n)
00067                 ),
00068                 fftwf_free
00069             );
00070         }
00071     };
00072     template <> struct FFTWTraits< std::complex<float> > {
00073         typedef fftwf_plan Plan;
00074         typedef FourierTraits< std::complex<float> >::ElementX ElementX;
00075         typedef FourierTraits< std::complex<float> >::ElementK ElementK;
00076         typedef boost::shared_ptr<ElementX> OwnerX;
00077         typedef boost::shared_ptr<ElementK> OwnerK;
00078         static inline Plan forward(int rank, const int *n, int howmany, 
00079                                    ElementX *in, const int *inembed, int istride, int idist,
00080                                    ElementK *out, const int *onembed, int ostride, int odist,
00081                                    unsigned flags) {                    
00082             return fftwf_plan_many_dft(rank, n, howmany,
00083                                     reinterpret_cast<fftwf_complex*>(in),
00084                                     inembed, istride, idist,
00085                                     reinterpret_cast<fftwf_complex*>(out),
00086                                     onembed, ostride, odist,
00087                                     FFTW_FORWARD, flags);
00088         }
00089         static inline Plan inverse(int rank, const int *n, int howmany,
00090                                    ElementK *in, const int *inembed, int istride, int idist,
00091                                    ElementX *out, const int *onembed, int ostride, int odist,
00092                                    unsigned flags) {

00094                                     reinterpret_cast<fftwf_complex*>(in),
00095                                     inembed, istride, idist,
00096                                     reinterpret_cast<fftwf_complex*>(out),
00097                                     onembed, ostride, odist,
00098                                     FFTW_BACKWARD,flags);
00099         }
00100         static inline void destroy(Plan p) { fftwf_destroy_plan(p); }
00101         static inline void execute(Plan p) { fftwf_execute(p); }        
00102         static inline OwnerX allocateX(int n) {

00106                 ),

00114                 ),
00115                 fftwf_free
00116             );
00117         }
